name: Social Network
description: A social network website that allows users to create accounts, login, and post messages, built with React,Node.js, Typescript,Tailwind,Redux and MongoDB

name: Employee Management System
description: A Employee Management System  that manage employees by adding, deleting, updating and searching them, built with React,Node.js, Typescript,Tailwind,Redux and MongoDB

name: Simple Ecommerce Website
description: A Simple Ecommerce Website that allows users to add products, delete products, update products,search products, and checkout products via Paypal, built with React, CSS, Firebase, and Paypal!

name: Responsive Website Design
description: Converted a figma design into a responsive website, built with React, CSS, and Firebase
